document_data.name: Hochtl
document_data.mainbody: '''Hochtl''' was a scribe in [[Far Payit]] in the 13th century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Hochtl was a scribe of renown, writing many scrolls. In [[1282 DR]], he recorded the history of a dying warrior who had entered the cursed city of [[Ixtzul]]. He also wrote a scroll about the [[Star Worm]].
